name: Bedouin
description:
By Muhammed Şahin

 

Concept : You are controlling a man and escape from snake

Target Audience : 5+

Game Flow Summary : The snakes fall on the player and try to escape with the W, A, S, D keys

Game Progression : You take score every snake you can escape

Objectives : Run away from the snakes

Physics : Player can hit snakes and die

Movements : Player can go in X and Y axises.

Story : We are controlling a Bedouin. Suddenly there is an earthquake and the snake is falling from the sky..

Area : A desert with snakes

Control System: Player controls the man with Up, Down, Right, Left or W, A, S, D keys.

Press space to stop the game

Development hardware and software: UNITY, game engine.
